publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2298 Brian Adam: Nurse Career Development and Trainingâ€”That the Parliament condemns the widespread practice in the NHS of making nurses undertake career development and training in their own time and at their own expense and calls upon the Scottish Executive and the health authorities to ensure that all nurse career development and training, and associated leave, is fully funded. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2298 Nurse Career Development and Training (lodged on 4 October 2001) Michael Matheson*, Robin Harper*
S1M-2298 Nurse Career Development and Training (lodged on 4 October 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2298 Nurse Career Development and Training (lodged on 4 October 2001) Kay Ullrich*
S1M-2298 Nurse Career Development and Training (lodged on 4 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2298 Nurse Career Development and Training (lodged on 4 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2298 Nurse Career Development and Training (lodged on 4 October 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2298 Nurse Career Development and Training (lodged on 4 October 2001) Irene McGugan*, Fiona McLeod*
